appStages.name: Introduction
Document Type
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "tag": "div",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Type\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003ePick the type of file to upload.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n \r\n\r\n \r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Document",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "description": "Select the type of Document you want to get testcases for",
              "inline": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": "0",
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "BRD",
                  "value": "0",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "FSD",
                  "value": "1",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "dataType": "string",
              "validateWhenHidden": false,
              "key": "document",
              "type": "radio",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },

appStages.name: TestCase Generator BRD
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "tag": "div",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eGenerate Test Cases\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eUpload the BRD document to generate the test cases.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Requirements File",
      "description": "Supports Pdf File ",
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "1KB",
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Destination Path",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "data/GENAI/TEST-QA-Testcase/Upload/",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "destinationPath",
      "properties": {
        "for": "file"
      },
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Context",
      "placeholder": "Enter User story and Acceptance criteria here",
      "description": "Put the query in single quotes(eg:\u0027this is context\u0027)",
      "customClass": "m-2",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "context",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {

          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload",

              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",

              "tableView": false,
              "key": "upload",
              "properties": {
                "for": "file"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,

          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],

    {

appStages.name: TestCase Review
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "tag": "div",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eTestCase Review\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eClick on \u0027Review TestCases\u0027 to view and validate status of TestCases\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eTest Case Metadata\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-container\"\u003e\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-header\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003cthead\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eField Name\u003c/th\u003e\r\n              \u003cth\u003eDescription\u003c/th\u003e\r\n            \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n          \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n      \u003cdiv class\u003d\"custom-table-body\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ctable class\u003d\"custom-table\"\u003e\r\n          \u003ctbody\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eFilename\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eName of the FRS document used to generate the test cases.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTest_case_id\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eUnique identifier for the test case.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTest_case_title\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eA short, readable title that summarizes the purpose of the test case.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eTest_case_description\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eA brief explanation of what the test case checks or validates.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd\u003eStatus\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd\u003eStatus of the test case: 0 \u003d Created, 1 \u003d Reviewed, 2 \u003d Approved, 3\u003d Rejected.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n            \r\n          \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n        \u003c/table\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Database",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "userdb",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "database",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Table",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "QA_Mst_TestCase",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "table",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "customClass": "m-2",

    {
      "label": "Columns",

        {

            {

              "action": "event",

              "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-left rounded",
              "tableView": false,
